description: '''Joseph Will Oldham''' (born January 15, 1970) is an American singer-songwriter and actor. From 1993 to 1997, he performed and recorded in collaboration with dozens of other musicians under variations of '''Palace''' (Palace, Palace Brothers, Palace Songs, and Palace Music). After briefly publishing music under his own name, in 1998 he adopted '''Bonnie''' "'''Prince'''" '''Billy''' as the name for most of his work.
